text: Hagi tamagra Babiloni kumamofona maka vahe'mota kezatita rankege nehinke'za, zamazama erisga hu'za hara osanunema hu'za tamagritegama esageta, Babiloni kuma kegina ahenafage hunetreta, manine'za kuma kvama nehaza zaza nontamina tapage hutreho. Na'ankure e'i Ra Anumzamofo arimpa ahe'za me'neanki, vahe'ma zamazeri havizama hu'nazaza huta zamagri'enena zamazeri haviza hiho.
